text: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  Slowly , those that left become aware of abilities they never thought possible.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  Slowly , those that are left become aware of abilities they never thought possible.  With practice and concentration people start to realize they can do things that they thought only happened in stories.

When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  Slowly , those that are left become aware of abilities they never thought possible.  With practice and concentration people start to realize they can do things that they thought only happened in stories.  The world is changing, and the people that remain must decide what to do with this new power.

When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  Slowly , those that are left become aware of abilities they never thought possible.  With practice and concentration people start to realize they can do things that they thought only happened in stories.  The world is changing, and the people that remain must decide what to do with this new power.  Using just their mind, people can now manipulate objects, moving them, changing their shape, exerting force on them.
